english.segment1: I will walk these streets alone. On this story i've been told. I know what people say. I've watched it growing old. I'm bitter and I'm cold
english.segment2: I will always understand. When you take me by the hand. Words are mystery. But everything I know. Is never let it go
english.segment3: Won't someone lead me. Won't someone take me. Won't someone feed me. It's lonely as I call
english.segment4: Moving on again. A little less to spend. I know there's more to me. I try to make it real. I'm living what I feel
english.segment5: When I'm sinking. I sell my fortune in. Find a way out. I pawn my soul again
